targets.query:
import "strings"

nexus =
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp" and (r._field == "sysDescr" or r._field == "sysDescr_str"))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: string(v: r._value) }))
  |> group(columns: ["source"]) |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "NX-OS") or strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "Nexus"))
  |> keep(columns: ["source"])

names_base =
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp" and r._field == "sysUpTime")
  |> group(columns: ["source","sysName"]) |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with name: string(v: r.sysName) }))
  |> keep(columns: ["source","name"])

names = join(tables: {a: names_base, b: nexus}, on: ["source"], method: "inner")

adm_all =
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "if_status_errors" and r._field == "ifAdminStatus")
  |> group(columns: ["source","ifDescr"]) |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => int(v: r._value) == 1)
  |> group(columns: ["source"]) |> count()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "admin_up"})

opr_all =
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "if_status_errors" and r._field == "ifOperStatus")
  |> group(columns: ["source","ifDescr"]) |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => int(v: r._value) == 1)
  |> group(columns: ["source"]) |> count()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "oper_up"})

adm = join(tables: {a: adm_all, b: nexus}, on: ["source"], method: "inner")
opr = join(tables: {a: opr_all, b: nexus}, on: ["source"], method: "inner")

ports = join(tables: {a: adm, b: opr}, on: ["source"], method: "inner")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with down_ports: if float(v: r.admin_up) - float(v: r.oper_up) < 0.0 then 0.0 else float(v: r.admin_up) - float(v: r.oper_up) }))
  |> keep(columns: ["source","admin_up","oper_up","down_ports"])

uptime =
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp" and r._field == "sysUpTime")
  |> group(columns: ["source"]) |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with uptime_days: float(v: r._value) / 100.0 / 86400.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["source","uptime_days"])

base = join(tables: {a: names, b: uptime}, on: ["source"], method: "left")
final = join(tables: {a: base, b: ports}, on: ["source"], method: "inner")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with ip: r.source, name: if r.name == "" then r.source else r.name, health_score: if r.down_ports > 0.0 then 1.0 else 0.0, connected: true }))
  |> keep(columns: ["ip","name","uptime_days","admin_up","oper_up","down_ports","health_score","connected"])
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["down_ports","ip"], desc: true)

final

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "if_status_errors" and
    (r._field == "ifAdminStatus" or r._field == "ifOperStatus") and
    r.source == "192.168.2.70"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["source","ifDescr","_field"]) |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["source","ifDescr"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with iface: string(v: r.ifDescr),
      admin: if exists r.ifAdminStatus then int(v: r.ifAdminStatus) else 0,
      oper:  if exists r.ifOperStatus then int(v: r.ifOperStatus) else 0
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with status:
        if r.admin == 1 and r.oper == 1 then "up"
        else if r.admin == 1 and r.oper != 1 then "issue"
        else "not_configured"
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["iface","status","admin","oper"])
  |> sort(columns: ["iface"])

ipFilter = "${ip}"
passAll  = ipFilter == "" or ipFilter == "*"

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cisco_cpu" and r._field == "cpmCPUTotal1minRev" and (passAll or r.source == ipFilter))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","source"])
  |> rename(columns: {source: "ip"})

ipFilter = "${ip}"
passAll  = ipFilter == "" or ipFilter == "*"

used = from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cisco_memory_pool" and r._field == "ciscoMemoryPoolUsed" and (passAll or r.source == ipFilter))
  |> group(columns: ["source","ciscoMemoryPoolName"]) |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["source"]) |> sum(column: "_value")

free = from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cisco_memory_pool" and r._field == "ciscoMemoryPoolFree" and (passAll or r.source == ipFilter))
  |> group(columns: ["source","ciscoMemoryPoolName"]) |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["source"]) |> sum(column: "_value")

join(tables: {a: used, b: free}, on: ["source"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with used_pct: 100.0 * float(v: r._value_a) / (float(v: r._value_a) + float(v: r._value_b)) }))
  |> keep(columns: ["used_pct"])
  |> rename(columns: {used_pct: "_value"})

list.name: ip
list.label: Nexus IP
list.query:
import "strings"
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp" and (r._field == "sysDescr" or r._field == "sysDescr_str"))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: string(v: r._value) }))
  |> group(columns: ["source"]) |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "NX-OS") or strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "Nexus"))
  |> keep(columns: ["source"]) |> group() |> distinct(column: "source")
  |> rename(columns: {source: "_value"})
